byline.original: By LAURE FOURQUET and MARK SCOTT

abstract: As the ride-booking service tries to persuade policy makers to allow it to operate in cities around the world, Uber drivers are being pulled over and given fines in Paris.

headline.main: Uber Drivers Face Fines in Paris
headline.print_headline: Fines Under New Rules in France Trip Up Uber in Paris

snippet: As the ride-booking service tries to persuade policy makers to allow it to operate in cities around the world, Uber drivers are being pulled over and given fines in Paris.
